ValidationRule.description: Prevents anyone other than GPT and Sys Admin from setting Membership Request to a blank value after having a value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT( ISNEW() ), NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT(PRIORVALUE( Membership_Request__c )))), ISBLANK(TEXT(Membership_Request__c)), IF( CASE($Profile.Name, 'Gift Processing',"FALSE", 'System Administrator', "FALSE", "TRUE") ='TRUE', True, False ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You do not have permission to edit this field. Please contact the Gift Processing Team.
